items.itemDescription: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.
items.itemLore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
items.itemTags: blink daggerside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemLore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
items.itemTags: blades of attackside shop sideshop armaments component

items.itemLore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
A medium weave of metal chains.
A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
items.itemTags: helm of iron willside shop sideshop armaments component

items.itemDescription: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.
items.itemLore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
A hammer forged of pure mithril.
Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

items.itemDescription: Active: Destroy Tree - Destroy a target tree. Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.
items.itemLore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
items.itemTags: quelling bladeside shop sideshop armaments component

items.itemLore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
items.itemTags: slippers of agilityside shop sideshop attributes component

items.itemLore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
A valued accessory for improving vitality.
items.itemTags: belt of strengthside shop sideshop attributes component

items.itemLore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
items.itemTags: band of elvenskinside shop sideshop attributes component

items.itemLore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
items.itemTags: robe of the magiside shop sideshop attributes component

items.itemLore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
You grow stronger just by holding it.
A long blade imbued with time magic.
A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
items.itemTags: ultimate orbside shop sideshop attributes component

items.itemLore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
items.itemTags: gloves of hasteside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemDescription: Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks. Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
items.itemTags: morbid maskside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemLore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
items.itemTags: ring of regenside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemLore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
items.itemTags: sage's maskside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemDescription: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.itemLore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
items.itemTags: boots of speedside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemDescription: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death.
items.itemTags: gem of true sight arcane component

items.itemDescription: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
items.itemLore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
items.itemTags: talisman of evasionside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemDescription: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
items.itemLore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
items.itemTags: magic stickside shop sideshop arcane component

items.itemDescription: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area. When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
items.itemLore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

items.itemDescription: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll or Boots of Travel dispels Ghost Form.
items.itemLore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

items.itemDescription: Use: Restores mana over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.
items.itemLore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

items.itemDescription: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.
items.itemLore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

items.itemDescription: Use: Reveal - Reveals invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

Use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated.
items.itemLore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

items.itemDescription: Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 6 minutes.
Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 3 minutes.
Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.
items.itemLore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

items.itemDescription: Creature that carries items to and from your base.
items.itemLore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.

items.itemDescription: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.
items.itemTags: town portal scrollside shop sideshop consumables consumable

items.itemDescription: Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.itemLore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.

items.itemDescription: Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.itemLore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
items.itemTags: ring of healthside shop sideshop secret shop secret_shop

items.itemLore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
items.itemTags: energy boosterside shop sideshop secret shop secret_shop

items.itemLore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

items.itemDescription: Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.itemLore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

items.itemDescription: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience. Cannot be used on Ancients.
items.itemLore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.
items.itemLore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
A small gemstone attached to several chains.

items.itemDescription: Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area. Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area. Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units. Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base. Requires Animal Courier.

items.itemDescription: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
items.itemLore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE. Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

items.itemDescription: Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage. Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
items.itemLore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

items.itemDescription: Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge. Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
items.itemLore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a 500 unit radius. Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

items.itemDescription: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.
items.itemLore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

items.itemDescription: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 25.0%.
items.itemLore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

items.itemDescription: Active: Cyclone - Target unit is swept up in a cyclone for 2.5 seconds, and is invulnerable. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple Eul's Scepters do not stack.
items.itemLore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
items.itemTags: eul's scepter of divinity caster rare

items.itemDescription: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to self-cast.
items.itemLore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

items.itemDescription: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
items.itemLore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

items.itemDescription: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 35 seconds.
items.itemLore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.
items.itemLore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

items.itemDescription: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
items.itemLore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies. Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second. This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.
items.itemLore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

items.itemDescription: Active: Avatar - Grants magic immunity. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.
items.itemLore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

items.itemDescription: Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds. Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies. Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 6 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.
items.itemLore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 20 seconds.
items.itemLore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.
items.itemLore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

items.itemDescription: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage. Lasts 4 seconds.
items.itemLore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
Regain lost courage.

items.itemDescription: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
items.itemLore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

items.itemDescription: Drops on death. Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.
items.itemLore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage. Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing.
items.itemLore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

items.itemDescription: Active: Toggles Burn Damage on or off. Passive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a 650 radius.
items.itemLore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
items.itemLore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
items.itemLore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 225 AoE around the target. Does not work on ranged heroes. Cleave damage on non-primary targets is not reduced by armor values.
items.itemLore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

items.itemDescription: Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 250% bonus damage. Ranged illusions deal 28% damage and take 300% bonus damage. Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.itemLore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
items.itemLore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

items.itemDescription: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 37 HP per second. You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.
items.itemLore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

items.itemDescription: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 9 seconds.
items.itemLore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds. Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.itemLore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

items.itemDescription: Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by 175% for 3.5 seconds. Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks. Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
items.itemLore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

items.itemDescription: Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance to release Chain Lighting on attack, dealing damage to multiple targets. Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
items.itemLore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target. Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. On ranged heroes, Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
items.itemLore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

items.itemDescription: Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit. Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks. Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
items.itemTags: helm of the dominator artifacts artifact

items.itemDescription: Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage. Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
items.itemLore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor. Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

items.itemDescription: Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
items.itemLore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

items.itemDescription: Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 25% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage. Lasts 12 seconds. Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks. Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: Once this mask is worn, it's bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

items.itemDescription: Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit. Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in damage. Upgradable. Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

items.itemDescription: Active: Ether Blast - Converts you and your target into ethereal form. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2.0x of your agility + 75 as damage.
items.itemLore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

items.itemDescription: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana. Lasts 10 seconds.
items.itemLore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.

items.itemDescription: Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
items.itemLore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged. Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
items.itemLore: Imbues your weapon with the venom of a poisonous spider.
items.itemTags: orb of venomside shop sideshop secret shop secret_shop

items.itemDescription: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.
items.itemLore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
items.itemTags: stout shieldside shop sideshop armaments component

items.itemDescription: Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +10 attack and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies. Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies. Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

items.itemDescription: Active: Valor - Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.
items.itemLore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

items.itemDescription: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.
Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 20.0 seconds.
items.itemLore: The headwear of corrupt magi.

items.itemDescription: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
items.itemLore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

items.itemDescription: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
items.itemLore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

items.itemDescription: Active: Disarms the target for 4.0 seconds. Lasts 3.0 on Melee targets. Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
items.itemLore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

items.itemDescription: Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE. Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units. Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
items.itemLore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

items.itemDescription: Active: Heal - Restores 170 HP over 10 seconds for the wearer. If you take damage from another player or Roshan, the heal is lost. Passive: Break - If you take damage 4 times in 10 seconds, Tranquil Boots become Boots of Speed until the last 10 seconds don't have 4 instances of damage.
items.itemLore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
